Articles.Content: Someone wanna Incorporate "Brown Aerospace" Into a Canadian Flag? Maybe Merge the B and A into a single cool looking letter?
That looks great thank you!
Spot on! That'll do nicely for the Flag of all Kerbin. Thanks very much!
Can you give me one last Vortex Ind flag (page 62 i beleive) which says "Research Division" at the top?
Can you give me one last Vortex Ind flag (page 62 i beleive) which says "Research Division" at the top?
Can I have a flag with all of the planets, and the Sun in the middle with the KSP logo inside? You guys forgot about me. ;-;

You sir need a BUMP.

Also, could you make a cool airforce sort of flag... I don't really care how it looks. I would like it without text, but if you want you can put something like KAF or Kerbal Airforce on it or whatever. Preferably without text. Thanks!
I have seen Dr. Who flags, but no Bad Wolf. Can someone make a flag based on Bad Wolf from Dr. Who?

I would like to make a rather "big" flag request. I would like four different flags for my new mod kits that I will be releasing. The four requests are:T

he first request I would like to make is a flag that says "Kerbal-Kea - Flatpack Mods, No Assembly Required" (Yes, my new modding 'company' as such will be Kerbal-Kea). The second request is for a flag that advertises my first mod pack - "Water and Steam - Back to the Past". The third request I would like to make is for a flag that advertises my second mod pack - "Nuclear Fuel Kit - The power of the future". The fourth and final request I would like to make is for a flag that advertises my third mod pack - "OGRE - Oils, Gases, Rockets, Explosions - What more do you want?". Even if you do not accept theses requests, I still thank you for your consideration and time to look at my request.

ToTheMun

Are you still takeing request? (Proberly?) then i would like to (be a Di*k and) make one agian.

I don't really know exactly what, but i change name so the it should say "OneEyed Industries", be on a black background and have an eye thingy with kerbol(/sun) as the pupillary (google translate says). mabye gold agian but not sure

I like that almost everyone ask if you're still takeing request

Glory to Arstotzka and its Space Program, my good sir.

By the way, I'd like to have a flag made from these, just HD-ified if possible:

can you give me the file for the text on this flag

and this flag

without the white background?(Or if you have the time replace the background image with these)

My first post, and my first contribution.

I give you the Flag of Yorkshire.

http://www.filedropper.com/yorkshireflag

Hello I was hoping I could get this made into a flag:

Of course take out the tiny text on flag already. I don't want a white background. I would Like RSA on there, stands for Raven Space Agency. Maybe kind of circularized on left to go with flow of circle, if that doesn't look good go with anything that does look good. I am not the artist. And maybe a KSP rocket some where to tie it into the theme of the game. Just let your imagination go, I'm sure someone will do an amazing job. Of course I like the wavy flag look that all the flags have, which I seen on here so far.

Thanks!

Edited September 29, 2014 by therealcrow999

Is there a bigger copy of this image available?
There is a website that I found image let me see if I can find it.

http://www.sa-cinn.com/Decals.htm

This has the image on this site. I hope it's big enough. I usually google Raven and Sun, and that image comes up.

Quoted from a previous thread:

I'd like it's background to be the starry outer space, with Kerbin just a bit offset towards southwest and Eve just behind Kerbin(though still looking like it's normal size - slightly bigger than Kerbin) a tad offset towards northeast. Don't make their offsets too close, though. I want for Eve to still be considerably visible and not have most of it occulted by Kerbin.

Then, there should be an orange line that goes through the middle of the flag, but doesn't necessarily starts at one edge and ends at the opposing edge. Just a few centimeters of distance between it's edges, sort of like the KSP flag. Above the orange line should be written the acronym "N.K.F.A." in purple, and below the line will be written "National Kerbin Federation of Planets" in blue.

Remember to not make Eve completely behind Kerbin. The two should be properly visible, but around 60% of Eve's surface will be behind Kerbin.

What size do I need if image, so someone can make me a flag?

This is the Flag I use. I am a big star wars fan and use this alot. it is based on the Rebel Alliance "Starbird" and in the EU it was used for Privateers operation with the Rebel Allaince

The NovaHawk
I would like the ESA flag, only yellow instead of blue and with an 'f' in place of the 'e'.

Can I have a request if someone is willing to do it? I would like to have a flag for my upcoming Space Company called "RCST". A light background(white or grey) and then a minimalistic design of a planet with an semi-ellipse outline around or over it to represent an orbit around the planet and then the text "RCST" (with fitting font like this) below the logo.

Or an alternate design if someone can do it, integrate and stylize the text "RCST" itself into the main logo art!

oh and I also would like the flag wavy map most of you guys use to be included (to make the flag more realistic)

Any work/design is appreciated! (better if someone makes both or you can surprise me with your own creativity!) and Advance Thanks to someone who can help me! I'm not good at designing

Edited December 18, 2013 by lyndonguitar
Hello? We have several unfilled requests! Not just mine, but at least two pages worth!
